snippet: Downloading free apps or other content from Apple’s stores doesn’t require having a credit card on file.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A column; downloading free apps or other content from Apple’s stores does not require having a credit card on file; changing photo in Windows 8; Tip of the Week on latest versions of Mac OS X that include keyboard shortcut.
lead_paragraph: Downloading free apps or other content from Apple’s stores doesn’t require having a credit card on file.

headline.main: Bypassing a Credit Card Requirement for Apps
